nodes.text: Essential Atlas Extra: The Knight Errant Gazetteer is an online supplement to The Essential Atlas by Daniel Wallace, Jason Fry, and John Jackson Miller, published on StarWars.com on November 12, 2012. It serves as a tie-in to the Knight Errant comic book series and includes the history and cartography of the Grumani sector. Much of it takes the form of a report made by Jedi Master Vannar Treece to Supreme Chancellor Genarra.
